name: Castle's Labyrinth
description:
I have a bad habit of starting projects and never finishing them, so I decided to give myself a challenge: make a game to completion within a single day. Well, this is a finished project, for all that it may be. It is not at all what I anticipated making when I started, and it's probably not very good. I ran out of time to properly play test it or balance it, but hey - it's finished.

I hope you enjoy, but no hard feelings if you don't. This is a game I made to prove to myself that I can actually finish something.

UPDATE: I took a couple minutes today to fix a couple glaring bugs. Hope that doesn't count as cheating. The project is now done to its original intent, with all of its imbalances and design flaws intact.
